# telegramma

Modular Telegram bot

## Installation

-   Clone the repo
-   Execute `pip3 install .` to install all the dependencies
-   Copy `example_config.py` to `config.py`
-   Put a bot token in `config.py`
-   Edit additional variables in `config.py`

## How to use

```sh
python3 -m telegramma
```
